title: Strengthening Practical Skills in App Development: Flipped Learning-Based Curriculum for Research Proposal Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the structure of a research proposal in a flipped learning environment based on the ADDIE model.
Through collaborative learning activities, learners can compose core elements of a research proposal from problem selection to methodology design.
By integrating asynchronous learning (video lectures, digital resources) via smart devices with face-to-face sessions (workshops, feedback sessions), learners can submit a polished research proposal.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
